structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Judge, Etc.; Interest Of Town In Suit Or Proceeding
law.text: No person shall be disqualified from acting as judge, magistrate, appraiser or officer of any kind in a suit or proceeding in which a town is interested by reason of his interest as an inhabitant thereof. No juror shall be disqualified by reason of being an inhabitant of Boston.
